mutants.code:
import re

def validate_email(email):
    """
    Validate an email address.
    
    The email is valid if it matches the standard email format, has at least one 
    uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character, 
    and its length is between 8 and 50 characters. Additionally, the email should 
    not contain any consecutive repeating characters or any whitespace characters.
    
    Parameters:
    email (str): Email address to validate.
    
    Returns:
    bool: True if the email is valid, False otherwise.
    """
    email_regex = ''
    if not re.match(email_regex, email):
        return False
    if len(email) < 8 or len(email) > 50:
        return False
    if not any((c.isupper() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c.islower() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c.isdigit() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c in "!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~" for c in email)):
        return False
    if re.search('(.)\\1', email):
        return False
    if any((c.isspace() for c in email)):
        return False
    return True

import re

def validate_email(email):
    """
    Validate an email address.
    
    The email is valid if it matches the standard email format, has at least one 
    uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character, 
    and its length is between 8 and 50 characters. Additionally, the email should 
    not contain any consecutive repeating characters or any whitespace characters.
    
    Parameters:
    email (str): Email address to validate.
    
    Returns:
    bool: True if the email is valid, False otherwise.
    """
    email_regex = "^[a-zA-Z0-9!#$%&\\'*+\\-/=?^_`{|}~]+(?:\\.[a-zA-Z0-9!#$%&\\'*+\\-/=?^_`{|}~]+)*@(?:[a-zA-Z0-9](?:[a-zA-Z0-9\\-]*[a-zA-Z0-9])?\\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}$"
    if not re.match(email_regex, email):
        return False
    if len(email) < 8 and len(email) > 50:
        return False
    if not any((c.isupper() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c.islower() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c.isdigit() for c in email)):
        return False
    if not any((c in "!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{|}~" for c in email)):
        return False
    if re.search('(.)\\1', email):
        return False
    if any((c.isspace() for c in email)):
        return False
    return True

    if not re.match(email_regex, email):

    if len(email) < 8 or len(email) > 50:
